synopsis: PxInt_t PxBcmp(PxUChar_t const *s, PxUChar_t const *d, PxSize_t len);

arguments.name: s
arguments.description: Address of first byte areas to compare

arguments.name: d
arguments.description: Address of second byte areas to compare

arguments.name: len
arguments.description: Number of bytes to be compared

retValues: `0` if the compare byte areas are equal
`Nonzero` value if the compare byte areas are not equal

long.text: PxBcmp compares the byte areas of length `len` starting at `s` or `d`, respectively. It returns `0`, if they are equal, and nonzero otherwise.
